just keep on trying a few keys ;)

I've found this solution and worked for me in all chapters and all serial registration errors.
Hope that helps.

Start menu > execute : type "REGEDIT"

the go to the key :
"HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Reality Pump\TwoWorlds\SerialKey"

in the right part window you got a key also called "SerialKey"

select it and "right click > modify"

in the new window that opens take out all the data and click "Ok"

next step is you launch back two worlds
This works :) First S/N I used.

do u mean, if game is disabled in firewall i shold enable it?

Keygen works fine with 1.3 patch.Firewalling regular .exe file don't work anymore,i blocked access for both main exe files,normal and dx10 exe and i was receiving not compatible with chapter 1,i first tried keygen after demo end.So i blocked entirely internet access,and keygen works perfectly,they changed something with internet access.I disabled my network card from device manager,later when i enabled it,game works just fine,they did some crapy protection here.
And one more thing,only with this keygen i was receiving something other than invalid serial number,this realy work.

Seials work fine. The 1.3 patch is essential, game's totally borked without it. Do this:
1- Install the game
2- Install patch
3 Use firewall to block the exe you use (there are two, one is dx9, the other dx10, you only need to block the one you use)
4- Windows firewall is easy, addd a new rule (type: program) for both outbound and inbound and select "block all"
5. Use the KG to do the silly activation over the phone.
6. Play through the prologue, takes a while.
7. When chapter 1 is ready to begin, it will ask for a serial. Use the KG to generate a new one, click generate many times, repeat this process until it gets one that works.
8. Repeat silly registration process as in step 5.
9. Done!
